Best 120v Mig Welders – Top 5 Picks & Reviews

June 7, 2021January 8, 2021 by Brayden
1.8k
SHARES
ShareTweet

Welding is an essential part of life when living at home or working outside your home at your office. You often need descent quality welders to weld your daily routine tasks.120v MIG welders are ideal choice for that as they are cheap and give ultra-premium welds on low profile tasks. They are powerful enough to join the metals correctly and permanently.

So for this reason we have collected some of the best 120V MIG welders that are extremely helpful and widely used for all your welding needs. So without any further delay, let’s get started.

List of 5 Best 120v Mig Welders

As mentioned earlier that welding is the basic requirement for every person and every household. Keeping this in mind, MIG welders are great machines to have at home and they easily weld all kind of metals including aluminum. 120v mig welders are great for such purposes and all listed welders have been selected after a long and practical in-depth research.

Best Overall

1. Hobart 500559 Handler 140v

Specifications:

  • Item Weight: 57 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 19 x 11 x 13 inches
  • Amperage Range: 25-10Amps
  • Duty Cycles: 20% @ 90Amps
  • Material: Steel, Stainless Steel, and Aluminum
  • Power Source: Corded-electric
  • Warranty Description: 5-year limited warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The Hobart 500559 Handler 140 is our first and most favorite 120v MIG welder. It is packed with rich features that are offered at extremely low prices. It is the best welding mig for all kinds of users regardless of whether they are experienced or not.

This machine has 140 Amperes of amperage range output and offers a 5-position voltage control selector which allows users to operate the welder at different volt settings.

The reason why users prefer this welding machine is that it provides 5-years of massive warranty that is extremely huge and no one is offering such warranty except this welder in such a low price.

Similarly, this is the best online 120v mig welder due to its user-friendly interface and American built quality.

As mentioned earlier, Hobart Handler 140 has a high output amperage range of 25-140Amperes but the machine is slightly heavy with 57 pounds weight. The design is extremely compact which makes it easy to carry around different places without causing any stress to the user.

As far as performance is concerned, it has a MIG and a Flux-core welding process. 20% duty cycles at 90A are powerful enough to weld household equipments.

Apart from this, this welder is capable of welding thin metals such as steel, stainless steel, and Aluminum by utilizing MIT function. It is an ideal machine for DIY’s and other small and large projects.

The4 voltage output and wire feed tracking settings to provide instant and easy adjustments for various thicknesses metals makes it the best 120v mig welder in this price range.

Another great feature of this mig is that it has a thermal over-load protection and a special motor damage protection which increases the overall lifespan of this product.

You get complete accessories with this welder including 10 feet cables with a clamp, Built-in dual-gauging regulator, & a solenoid valve plus gas hose. If you’ve low budget then check out our Best Cheap Mig Welder Review.

So overall, it is a great welding machine and indeed the best one from our list. The reviews are extremely positive and the brand is trustable. It is selected by most of the users as this product has provided the best quality to its users.

Strength
  • Great amperage range
  • 4 voltage output and wire feed tracking settings
  • Five-position voltage control
  • Built-in dual-gauging regulator
  • MIG and a Flux-core welding process
  • Less welding spatters
Weakness
  • Might not be suitable for the places where there is no AC power supply

Amazon’s Choice

2. Forney Easy Weld 261

Specifications:

  • Item Weight: 19 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 16.7 x 12 x 8.1 inches
  • Amperage Range: 140Amps
  • Duty Cycles: 30% @ 90Amps
  • Material: Metals
  • Warranty Description: 1-year limited warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The Forney easy weld 261 is one of the best 120V mig welders. It is extremely lightweight and covers all the useful features that a basic welder requires in a low price.

The most beautiful thing about this welding machine is that it is packed with a voltage regulator which keeps the user safe from any kind of electric shock. Moreover, it is easy to run and a perfect 120v mig welder for beginners, professionals, and hobbyist welders.

The device is packed with all the essential features furthermore; it has high amperage range of 140Amperes offered at extremely low price. 

The great thing about this mig welder is that it comes with a 1-year warranty plan which provides relaxation to the user while purchasing it.

Besides this, it is extremely lightweight unit with only 19 pounds but it can easily weld ¼ of thick metal. The build is premium and the finish is also good.

So overall, Forney Easy Weld 261 is the best 120V welding machine and it is the most running welding machine on the internet.

Check it out if you’re looking for best mig welders.

Strength
  • Standard household current
  • 30% duty cycles at 90A
  • Extremely lightweight
  • Infinite Voltage capacity
  • Voltage regulator to avoid shocks
Weakness
  • You have to clean the spatters after welds

Premium 120v Mig Choice

3. Hobart Handler 125

Specifications:

  • Item Weight: 62.9 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 19.4 x 10 x 13.5 inches
  • Amperage Range: 25-130Amps
  • Duty Cycles: 20% @ 90Amps
  • Material: Plastic Metal
  • Power Source: Corded-electric
  • Warranty Description: 5-year limited warranty
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Hobart Handler 125 is our 3rd most-best MIG welder. It is the best machine as compared to others for a few reasons and those are its unique features and its powerful welding capacity.

It is a small, compact, and lightweight Mig machine which is accompanied with a 5-3-1 year warranty on its various parts that makes it unique in its own kind.

The first thing that is best for this welder is that it is extremely easy to set up and it’s easy to use as well. User does not require any skill to operate this machine.

Secondly, it is affordable along with standard household current running capacity. So it is ideal for 115V current input which is a standard household current in almost every house.

Third most good thing about this welder is that it is flexible welding equipment which means that you can either use it as a flux core wire welder or as a gas MIG welder which makes it a convertible mig machine.

Moreover, it has a high range of duty cycles of 20% at 90Amperes which is similar to Hobart Handler 140. Thus it can easily weld thick metals or steel from 24guage to 1/3 inches. It can go with higher ranges as well.

The 7th most good thing about this cheap 120v MIG welder is that it is equipped with electric cold trigger that reduces the chances of shocks and other accidents.

However, the uniqueness of this welder is that it has a Four voltage control setting to adjust it according to the voltages and a self restarting system which allows to self-restart the machine if something goes beyond its capacity.

Due to the trustable brand label, Hobart Handler 125 MIG Welder offers premium build quality with high amperage range of 25-130Amps along with a factory-installed Gas solenoid and built-in Contactor that helps to change from Flux-cored wire to MIG welding and keeps the wire “cold” until gun trigger is pulled off respectively.

Overall, it is a great 120v MIG welder for beginners and for professionals as well. It has some unique features that are not offered in any other welding machines but have its own limitations as well. Other than that, it is a great welding machine for every household.

If you plan to be welding stainless steel and aluminum with your welder, then check out our best Mig welder for aluminum.

Strength
  • 5-3-1 parts warranty
  • Equipped with the electric cold trigger to avoid shocks
  • Easy to set up and easy to use
  • Four voltage control setting
  • Standard household current compatible
  • Self-restarting system
  • 5-years warranty
Weakness
  • Few complaints regarding material quality

Starter 120v Welder

4. ARCRAFT Inverter

Specifications:

  • Item Weight: 20 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 19.4 x 10 x 13.5 inches
  • Amperage Range: 130Amps
  • Duty Cycles: 30% @ 90Amps
  • Material: Metal
Check On Amazon

Overview:

The perfect welder for starters, ARCRAFT inverter flux core 140 mig welder is an ideal welding machine that is offered at a descent price range. It is the best 120v mig welder containing different features from all other welders.

ARCRAFT mig has an infinite voltage and wire feed speed that helps to produce quality welds and makes the use of welder easy. Looking for a home use welder checkout our best MIG welder for home use.

It is an extremely lightweight unit after Forney Easy Weld 261 with only 20pounds of total weight. With ARCRAFT Flux Core inverter, you can easily weld all kinds of metals and it is perfect for DIY’s and other household tasks.

The cool thing about this welder is that it is protected with thermal overload protection and cold start wire feeding which is extremely helpful in case of electric and heating shocks.

The DC output of this welder provides more stable arcs thus resulting in nice and cleaner welds and offers a variable controls for premium quality welds.

Summing up, the dual-frequency ARCRAFT Flux Core Mig Welder is a great choice if you go with such kind of features. The benefits are good and the price is also very low. If you want to know that it can weld aluminum or not then, it is not capable of welding aluminum and stainless steel. Although it has high duty cycles of 30% and 130Amperes of Amperage range.

Strength
  • 30% duty cycles
  • High Amperage Range of 130Amps
  • Extremely lightweight
  • Infinite voltage and wire feed speed
  • DC output to provide stable arcs
  • Dual Frequency
Weakness
  • Not build for high-end industrial use

Premium Quality

5. Miller Welder, MIG/Flux Core

Specifications:

  • Item Weight: 64.1 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 23.9 x 15.6 x 16.9 inches
  • Amperage Range: 30-140Amps
  • Duty Cycles: 20% @ 90Amps
  • Power Source: Corded-electric
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Last but not the least, Welder, MIG/Flux Core is a DC 120v mig welder which is the product of Miller Company. It is a Corded-electric powered source mig machine that provides numerous safety functions to provide the safety to the end-user.

The Miller Electric Welder MIG/Flux Core 120v mig welder is manufactured in USA thus the quality of this product is great and it is a trustable welding machine as well.

Besides this, the welder is extensively lightweight and easily operates on the standard household current. It is capable of welding Mild Steel, Stainless Steel and Aluminum of various thicknesses ranging from 24 gauges to 3/16 Inches.

Other than this, it is good for small purposes. Expecting more from this welding machine is not the right thing to do. It can take care of small tasks such as welding household items and DIY projects

To conclude, it is the best 120v MIG welder for light use, can’t expect more from it, but the DC output assures the premium quality welds. So going with this machine can be a good decision if you need a small welder for basic tasks.

Strength
  • Easy to use
  • Trustable brand
  • Welds aluminum and other steels
  • Great for beginners
  • Premium quality welds

FAQ’s

There are many 120v mig welders available in the market that are bought for different purposes but the best one is Hobart 500559 Handler 140 due to its wide range of features. Many people also prefer Forney Easy Weld 261 due to its cheapest price and enrich features.

There is different range of Amps that a 120v mig welder utilizes but often most of them use a common range of 25-130Amps. The higher the ampere range, the wider the scope of welding will be.

If you want a better 120v mig welder for beginner use that has plenty of features and good quality build that can last longer and come handy in different projects then Hobart Handler 140 and Forney Easy Weld 261 are the best options.

Yes, all the 120v mig welders mentioned above are portable in a sense that they are lightweight, compact in design, and have someway around a handle or easy grip to carry them around anywhere in the required field of work.

Conclusion

Welding is almost required by every user. 120v mig welders are great for home based working tasks. They are a ‘must-have’ welding machines to avoid the delays and other expenses when you require urgent welds.The most preferred one and the best 120v mig welder is Hobart 500559 Handler 140 and Forney easy weld 261. They are most demanded and high performance mig welders in current range.
